short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto replace text and save the result as png

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your Canva designs with variables. A helpful tool for print on demand businesses.
Are you a print on demand entrepreneur and want an easier way to create multiple designs? 

Look no further than Automate Canva. Automate Canva allows you to create a generic design on canva.com and fills in the templated variables with ones from a CSV formatted file. This tool will scale your Print-On-Demand business by unlocking the potential to automate your designs.

AutomateCanva also helps with your digital downloads for Etsy by utilizing the main variable feature.

******************************** FREE ***********************************************
